title: Deyata Kirula successful- Progress Report Presented
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Nalin Hewapathirana) Progress report of the’Deyata Kirula- 2011’ Development Exhibition which was held in Buttala area in Monaragala district concurrently with the 63rd Independence Day celebrations, presented to President Mahinda Rajapaksa by the Chairman of the Exhibition Organising Committee Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya at the Temple Trees on…
